body: At least the person tried to translate and I am thankful for it. Complaining aside, you guys should translate it then, would be a great help.
I gave up on reading by page 2.
That grammar was worst than I expected...
If someone could atleast fix the grammar and make it much easier to read. That would be a big relief
Grammar may be sheit but its not like i can read japanese or something so it is what it is
BruhI could do a better translation

@Iexpectedbetter23 Bitch, you call people who stand up for artists who just want their due retards and believe that "cucks" should be killed. Of course, you'd think this would be better than nothing. Because nothing means anything to you.
I mean the TL is better than I could do (since I only know a handful of kanji). But I guess the text/QC is always a nice tell of what you're getting there with the grammar.
I just had a stroke reading this. And it wasn't the kind of stroke i came here for!
